comment: Prof Smith is one of the easiest teachers ever! She cares about your grade more than you do, I think. Tries to make class as easy as possible. Class is very interesting. It's a good amount of work but it is easy. A couple of projects. Easy A.
Don't take her class if your looking to enjoy your semester. It's basically one long group assignment.

She's amazing! She's extremely helpful and is very nice. There were only 2 tests and the second test was the final exam and it was online. There are a lot of activities that she has due through D2L and a lot of discussions, but if you constantly check it and do them, you'll be fine.
